newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies 12 issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies 12 issues for bond insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said it has qualified for bond insurance the following 12 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Alvord USD, Calif., $12 million general obligation bonds.
--St. Francis SD, Minn., $22.35 million refunding GOs.
--Monroe Township Board of Education, N.J., $15.470 million school district bonds.
--Nassau County, N.Y., $191.185 million general improvement bonds and $3.205 million sewer district bonds.
